CustomField.description: Internal field used to calculate compensation per quarter
CustomField.formula: IF(MONTH(CloseDate) <= 3 && YEAR(CloseDate)=YEAR(TODAY()), 1, IF(MONTH(CloseDate) > 3 && MONTH(CloseDate) <= 6 && YEAR(CloseDate)=YEAR(TODAY()), 2, IF(MONTH(CloseDate) > 6 && MONTH(CloseDate) <= 9 && YEAR(CloseDate)=YEAR(TODAY()), 3, IF(MONTH(CloseDate) > 9 && MONTH(CloseDate) <= 12 && YEAR(CloseDate)=YEAR(TODAY()), 4,0))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets the number for the quarter in which the Opportunity is closed won - if Opportunity is closed in a quarter from a previous year the quarter will be 0
CustomField.label: Quarter for Opportunity Closed Won
